Interests

Apart from being a data scientist, like to spend my free time doing physical activities that range from playing basketball, to lifting, and even to woodworking. In the winter I enjoy snowboarding and being on a mountain while in the summer I prefer to be on a boat, skiing or wakeboarding.

When indoors, I like to read sci-fi and fantasy novels, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in data science and AI.
